title: Rick
description: Three months have passed since Joey moved in with Rick. The trauma of Joey's past is never far from the surface but it's not stopping them from building a life together. Until the night Joey walks into his abuser in a restaurant and they are forced to face reality: Blake is still in control.  Convinced he can never been free, Joey prepares to run but when Blake attacks Maisie - the first real friend Joey's ever had - he wonders if he has what it takes to stand up to the man how tortured him for so long.   Book 2 of 3 TRIGGER WARNING: This book contains reference to repeated domestic sexual physical and mental abuse.
author: Angelique Jurd
